about.name: Poker Zombie
about.desc: Poker zombie is a platform that allows users to compare different online poker platforms, helping them determine which site best suits their needs based on the features offered by each platform

projectTeam.desc: The project’s design took two weeks to complete.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Problem?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• The client wanted to build a website/platform to compare different online poker platforms, helping users determine which site best suits their needs based on the features offered by each platform.
  • The website also showcases content related to the poker world, such as poker news, important events, articles, and videos about poker strategies, and more.

projectDetails_1.heading: What were the Goals?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Help users compare and choose the best online poker platforms easily.
  • Provide poker-related content like news, strategies, and event updates.
  • Create a clean, engaging, and professional user experience without looking scammy.
  • Seamlessly integrate advertisements while maintaining trust and credibility.

projectDetails_1.heading: What was the Solution?
projectDetails_1.desc:
• Created an intuitive and clean design that allows users to quickly compare top poker platforms without feeling overwhelmed.
  • Used a calming color scheme and professional design elements to instill trust, making the website feel legitimate and reliable.
  • Implemented a clear, organized layout for poker-related content, such as news, events, and strategies, making it easily accessible.

projectDetails_2.heading: Behind the Scenes...
projectDetails_2.desc:
Target Audience

  • Indian poker enthusiasts or those looking to get into poker, aged 19-34.

Research and Analysis

  • Conducted an initial interview as part of a user study to understand the target audience’s preferences, needs, and expectations.
  • Performed market analysis, focusing on poker websites as specified by the client, to identify industry standards and trends for inspiration.

Moodboarding

  • Created mood boards to define the visual direction, including color schemes, typography, and imagery that align with the poker theme and client's brand.

UI Design and Layout Exploration

  • Designed multiple layouts, exploring different structures for the landing page to optimize user experience and ensure intuitive navigation.
  • Incorporated feedback from the client to refine designs, ensuring alignment with their vision and business goals.

projectDetails_2.heading: User Interface and Product Outlook
projectDetails_2.desc:
• The user interface features a clean, professional design with a predominantly red and white color scheme, using the “Raleway” typeface for typography.
  • The product layout emphasizes key information through well-defined cards and buttons, with clear navigation elements and prominent call-to-action sections.

projectDetails_3.heading: Conclusion
projectDetails_3.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?

  • Successfully designed Poker Zombie platform delivering a clean and professional website that helps users compare poker platforms and access poker-related content.
  • The user-friendly design ensures easy navigation, builds trust, and aligns with both user expectations and client goals.

projectDetails_3.heading: Client Feedback
projectDetails_3.desc:
What did we achieve from the project ?

  • Re-designed the entire pokerZombie app with a fresh outlook of minimalist and simpler user interface.
  • The new design improves usability and enhances pokerZombie’s image as a reliable platform for connecting users with contractors and suppliers.
